abstract: Four-year contracts that Detroit’s automakers signed with the United Automobile Workers ensure that labor costs will remain manageable in the near future, and will not undermine companies' fragile turnarounds.
snippet: The four-year contracts that Detroit’s automakers signed with the United Automobile Workers ensure that labor costs will remain manageable in the near future.
lead_paragraph: The four-year contracts that Detroit’s automakers signed with the United Automobile Workers ensure that labor costs will remain manageable in the near future.

headline.main: With New Labor Contracts, Detroit Protects Turnaround
headline.print_headline: With New Labor Contracts, Detroit Protects Turnaround
headline.seo: Auto Labor Contracts with U.A.W. Help Protect a Turnaround
